## Description {#details}

This header provides classes for managing a pipeline of passes over loops in LLVM IR.

The primary loop pass pipeline is managed in a very particular way to provide a set of core guarantees: 1) Loops are, where possible, in simplified form. 2) Loops are <em>always</em> in LCSSA form. 3) A collection of Loop-specific analysis results are available:
<ul>
<li>LoopInfo</li>
<li>DominatorTree</li>
<li>ScalarEvolution</li>
<li>AAManager 4) All loop passes preserve #1 (where possible), #2, and #3. 5) Loop passes run over each loop in the loop nest from the innermost to the outermost. Specifically, all inner loops are processed before passes run over outer loops. When running the pipeline across an inner loop creates new inner loops, those are added and processed in this order as well.</li>
</ul>


This process is designed to facilitate transformations which simplify, reduce, and remove loops. For passes which are more oriented towards optimizing loops, especially optimizing loop <em>nests</em> instead of single loops in isolation, this framework is less interesting.

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class provides an interface for updating the loop pass manager based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// on mutations to the loop nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A reference to an instance of this class is passed as an argument to each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Loop pass, and Loop passes should use it to update LPM infrastructure if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// they modify the loop nest structure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\c LPMUpdater comes with two modes: the loop mode and the loop-nest mode. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop mode, all the loops in the function will be pushed into the worklist</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and when new loops are added to the pipeline, their subloops are also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inserted recursively. On the other hand, in loop-nest mode, only top-level</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loops are contained in the worklist and the addition of new (top-level)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loops will not trigger the addition of their subloops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LPMUpdater &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This can be queried by loop passes which run other loop passes (like pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// managers) to know whether the loop needs to be skipped due to updates to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the loop nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this returns true, the loop object may have been deleted, so passes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// should take care not to touch the object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#abdeee8c28f2338c206068a0ebc1607ab"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#abdeee8c28f2338c206068a0ebc1607ab">skipCurrentLoop</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SkipCurrentLoop; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Loop passes should use this method to indicate they have deleted a loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// from the nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note that this loop must either be the current loop or a subloop of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// current loop. This routine must be called prior to removing the loop from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the loop nest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this is called for the current loop, in addition to clearing any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// state, this routine will mark that the current loop should be skipped by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the rest of the pass management infrastructure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#ad898592a9fdc638d33b6b5cf0eba2bbe"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#ad898592a9fdc638d33b6b5cf0eba2bbe">markLoopAsDeleted</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> Name) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LAM.clear(L, Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((&amp;L == CurrentL || CurrentL-&gt;contains(&amp;L)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot delete a loop outside of the &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;subloop tree currently being processed.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;L == CurrentL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SkipCurrentLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#a709b63e4a32a170993568d8319ef6e69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#a709b63e4a32a170993568d8319ef6e69">setParentLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;ABI&#95;BREAKING&#95;CHECKS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ParentL = L;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Loop passes should use this method to indicate they have added new child</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loops of the current loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p NewChildLoops must contain only the immediate children. Any nested</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loops within them will be visited in postorder as usual for the loop pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// manager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#ad76f37ff51a1cc6ecca63633f2247c2f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#ad76f37ff51a1cc6ecca63633f2247c2f">addChildLoops</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Loop &#42;&gt;</a> NewChildLoops) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!LoopNestMode &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Child loops should not be pushed in loop-nest mode.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert ourselves back into the worklist first, as this loop should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// revisited after all the children have been processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Worklist.insert(CurrentL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;NewL : NewChildLoops)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NewL-&gt;getParentLoop() == CurrentL &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;All of the new loops must &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;be immediate children of &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;the current loop!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab7a106c600cf32852298d9041e8c8044">appendLoopsToWorklist</a>(NewChildLoops, Worklist);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also skip further processing of the current loop--it will be revisited</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after all of its newly added children are accounted for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SkipCurrentLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Loop passes should use this method to indicate they have added new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// sibling loops to the current loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p NewSibLoops must only contain the immediate sibling loops. Any nested</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loops within them will be visited in postorder as usual for the loop pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// manager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#ae95084eaa2138306765de7c711fa65b5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#ae95084eaa2138306765de7c711fa65b5">addSiblingLoops</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Loop &#42;&gt;</a> NewSibLoops) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;ABI&#95;BREAKING&#95;CHECKS &amp;&amp; !defined(NDEBUG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;NewL : NewSibLoops)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NewL-&gt;getParentLoop() == ParentL &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoopNestMode)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Worklist.insert(NewSibLoops);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab7a106c600cf32852298d9041e8c8044">appendLoopsToWorklist</a>(NewSibLoops, Worklist);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to skip the current loop or revisit it, as sibling loops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shouldn&#39;t impact anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Restart the current loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Loop passes should call this method to indicate the current loop has been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// sufficiently changed that it should be re-visited from the begining of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the loop pass pipeline rather than continuing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#abdbad166a49b68a4a471dd24e694dbcd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#abdbad166a49b68a4a471dd24e694dbcd">revisitCurrentLoop</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tell the currently in-flight pipeline to stop running.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SkipCurrentLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And insert ourselves back into the worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Worklist.insert(CurrentL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#a92a38a4f790ce77378807db8fc9cbfee"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lpmupdater/#a92a38a4f790ce77378807db8fc9cbfee">isLoopNestChanged</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IRUnitT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PassT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;PreservedAnalyses&gt; LoopPassManager::runSinglePass(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IRUnitT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, PassT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64conditionalcompares-cpp/#ab15af716dfa3d6f1fa7978be4639bd8e">Pass</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58dde534a0ea2a23cb6c779c5c283f75">LoopAnalysisManager</a> &amp;AM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LoopStandardAnalysisResults &amp;AR, LPMUpdater &amp;U, PassInstrumentation &amp;PI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the loop in case of Loop pass and outermost loop in case of LoopNest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass which is to be passed to BeforePass and AfterPass call backs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Loop &amp;L = getLoopFromIR(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the PassInstrumentation&#39;s BeforePass callbacks before running the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass, skip its execution completely if asked to (callback returns false).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PI.runBeforePass&lt;Loop&gt;(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64conditionalcompares-cpp/#ab15af716dfa3d6f1fa7978be4639bd8e">Pass</a>, L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Adaptor that maps from a function to its loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Designed to allow composition of a LoopPass(Manager) and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FunctionPassManager. Note that if this pass is constructed with a \\c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FunctionAnalysisManager it will run the \\c LoopAnalysisManagerFunctionProxy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analysis prior to running the loop passes over the function to enable a \\c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopAnalysisManager to be used within this run safely.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The adaptor comes with two modes: the loop mode and the loop-nest mode, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the worklist updater lived inside will be in the same mode as the adaptor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (refer to the documentation of \\c LPMUpdater for more detailed explanation).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Specifically, in loop mode, all loops in the function will be pushed into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the worklist and processed by \\p Pass, while only top-level loops are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// processed in loop-nest mode. Please refer to the various specializations of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\fn createLoopFunctionToLoopPassAdaptor to see when loop mode and loop-nest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mode are used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontolooppassadaptor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontolooppassadaptor/#af19b27626ff9f21d5ccadd7ffb7beff8">FunctionToLoopPassAdaptor</a></span></CodeLine>
